title: Am I banned
body: My Client doesn't connect it half shows the Main page but the reconnect button is at the bottom. And it wont connect to anything am I banned or not. Usually it tells you on the main page but there is nothing there Help me please

replies.body:
Hey there,

That's not the behaviour I'd expect if you were banned, so it's pretty safe to assume you're not.

Is this issue still occurring? could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if that helps at all.
Never mind I got perma banned o fucking yay :/
